extendedInfo.description: Now the #1 ranked hot potato phrase guessing party game from iPhone is available on Android!If you like Party Word games like Catch Phraseâ¢, Tabooâ¢, Scattergoriesâ¢ or Charades then this is the app for you! Phrase Party! guaranteed to bring even the biggest party poopers come to life and join the fun. ************************************************************************  This is the Free, Lite version of the app. It includes only    2 Categories out of 7. Please try it out and upgrade!        ************************************************************************â Rated The #3 Application on the App Store by toptentopten.com â Rated one of the top 6 Party Games by techbu.com â "It makes the party entertaining and full of life." -- Techbu.com â "Its a great way to get your friends together and have some fun" -- DayFly.com What is Phrase Party? ----------- Phrase Party is a simple but exciting game where you try to describe a phrase that appears on the screen to your teammates by using words, not gestures. You pass the device around until the timer goes off and the person holding the device loses. Phrase Party! is beautiful, simple to use, super fun and packed with features that other, similar apps can only dream of. What separates Phrase Party! from the competition? ---------- â AWESOME PHRASES: Hand picked phrase database of over 10K words and growing from these categories. Choose one category, mix and match, or pick 'Everything' to use them all. - Sports - Entertainment - Science - Places - Food - World - Sayings â EXPANSION PHRASE PACKS: Play with amazing and hilarious expansion categories that you can buy.- Adult- College- Tha Streetz - Vampire Sagas - Tis the Season - Stars and Stripes â CUSTOMIZATION: Add your own phrases and phrase categories. Share them with your friends. Set your timer length, play with up to 4 teams, set team names and more. â GREAT INTERFACE: A clean, beautiful interface that you will feel right at home using. â NO REPEATS: or spelling errors. I promise. I have recently responded to user feedback and completely redesigned this app to provide a better User Experience in version 2.0. Please keep this in mind as you browse older app reviews.------ Although The rules and game play in Phrase Party!'s classic mode are very similar to that of Catch Phraseâ¢ by Hasbro Inc., Catch Phraseâ¢ is a registered trademark of Hasbro Inc. This product is in no way affiliated or endorsed by Hasbro and should not be confused with their product, Catch Phraseâ¢.

reviews.title: Good game, fatal flaw, permissions
reviews.comment: Cancels game when hitting back button, something fairly likely to happen when paying phone around. If this is fixed, I\'d probably buy it. Also, should be able to deduct points, and there\'s a speaker pop sound between each beep. 1 star for new unexplained permission.
reviews.author: Steven J

reviews.comment: dumb and clumsy interface
reviews.author: angie lina

reviews.title: Great party game
reviews.comment: Would like to see an option for \"random timer length\" rather than a fixed length every time
reviews.author: Bernard Ho

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This game is so fun!! Totally turned it into a drinking game...

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Love it.

reviews.title: Bad developer
reviews.comment: Purchased full version and never received all categories. Emailed developer, no response or refund. Do not purchase.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Catch Phrase
reviews.comment: More categories and words. The application worked perfectly and was easy to install and use on my Droid X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: Bought full version and only got a few new categories. Must spend another dollar for each new category after that.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t like the notification bar ads
reviews.comment: This app has ads that show in the notification bar. I don\'t mind the in-app ads, kind of expect those in a free app. But i don\'t want ads popping up in my notification bar, especially when I\'m not even running the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Omg so fun! Started playing this at a restaurant with a group and had a  blast
